# Reway — Full Site Summary

Reway is a calm, AI-first bookmarking workspace that transforms noisy links into a structured library. It focuses on fast capture, clean organization, and efficient navigation for people who save a lot of research and inspiration.

## Product overview
Reway helps you drop in messy notes or screenshots and extracts the links automatically. The system enriches each entry with titles and preview metadata so your library stays readable and searchable.

## Core features
- **AI Link Extraction**: Paste raw text or notes. Reway pulls every link, title, and preview without extra steps.
- **Groups**: Keep research, inspiration, and builds separated with labeled groups and smart counts.
- **Keyboard Navigation**: Move through bookmarks with arrow keys, preview instantly, and act without touching the mouse.
- **Flexible View Modes**: Switch between card, list, and icon layouts to fit the amount of context you need.

## Primary routes
- https://reway.vercel.app/ — landing page with product overview and feature demos
- https://reway.vercel.app/login — sign in

## Brand
- Name: Reway
- Tone: calm, focused, productivity-first
- Visual language: dark-neutral UI, minimal cards, subtle motion
